"The Mysterious D-arkers Outbreak":
"Even you have heard that D-arkers have been
increasing recently right?
Some higher-ups have put in some serious investigation
into this, and a bunch of investigation requests
have come my way.
Speaking of that, I want to talk about the Ruins we've
just found. Preliminary information is scarce.
If you have time, why don't you come with me?
*Clear on S rank traveling only with Zeno"

"最近ダーカーが増え続けてるっての
お前さんも知ってるよな？
お偉いさん方も、いよいよ本腰入れて
調査することにしたみたいで、俺のところ
にも何件か調査依頼が来てんだよ。
とはいえ、見つかって間もない遺跡だ。
事前情報もいまいち乏しくてな。
よければ、ひとつ付き合っちゃくれないか？

※ゼノのみ同行、Ｓランククリア"
